overview:
Mathew has a diverse background in Marketing and IT, that has lead him to focus on his primary interest, which is ecommerce and SEO/SEM. Both elements are the fundamental tools needed in order to achieve success in today’s business world. He completed two years of business marketing from Fanshawe College, complemented by a web design and graphic design program at the Academy of Design Toronto. These programs heightened his entrepreneurial spirit and led him to e-commerce management at Sheridan College.

In 2007, he started eKKO Internet Marketing which provides a wide range of services from seo, sem, ppc, videos, print services, graphic design and online PR. eKKO is a Google accredited company and in effect they can provide most marketing services but their primary focus is improving a company’s rank in major search engines. As a small company without the overhead of an expensive downtown office, they can provide services catered to our customer bases needs at an efficient cost.

At VELUX Canada, Mathew is in charge of all Online and offline Advertisements. He also is the internet marketing specialist, which encompasses responsibilities such as search engine optimization, internet marketing, online media buying, analytical reports and brand reputation management.
